Sections.Title: What happened?
Sections.Content:
In a nutshell; the URL you provided does not point to any page on this website. However, it is highly likely we actually have that page still, just under a slightly different URL now.
Without getting into too much detail, when the RookieHPC website was ported to Github Pages in July 2022, it lost support for PhP (URLs ending with ".php"). As a result, such URLs had to be restructured, see an example for MPI_Send below:
Old URL formathttps://rookiehpc.com/mpi/docs/mpi_send.php
New URL formathttps://rookiehpc.com/mpi/docs/mpi_send/index.html

Sections.Title: What about now?
Sections.Content: Let say you were searching the page about <tt>MPI_Send</tt>, simply type <tt>MPI_Send</tt> in the search bar at the top of this page, and you will get there in no time :) As soon as we find a way to make those redirections automatically for you, we will, pinky promise.
